      void MapEditorController.loadMapHandler()
      This method handles loading the map to the UI from input file by parsing and checking validity of the map

    • com.risk.model.utilities中CountLimitException的使用

      抛出CountLimitException的com.risk.model.utilities中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Validate.continentChecks()
      This method is used to check if the number of countries in continents is equal to the maximum number that is set to the continent

      This method is used to validate the map by connecting country with its neighbours
